Title: Ornette Coleman releases Free Jazz
Description: The groundbreaking double quartet album that pioneers free jazz.

Title: John Coltrane releases Giant Steps
Description: Showcases his complex “Coltrane changes” and advanced improvisation.

Title: Wynton Marsalis is born
Description: Future trumpet prodigy and jazz advocate.

Title: Bill Evans Trio records Waltz for Debby
Description: A landmark piano trio album blending lyricism and harmonic depth.

Title: Wayne Shorter joins Miles Davis Quintet
Description: Starts contributing compositions that redefine jazz harmony.

Title: Herbie Hancock joins Miles Davis Quintet
Description: Brings fresh harmonies and rhythmic ideas, advancing post-bop.

Title: John Coltrane records Impressions
Description: Highlights his exploration of modal jazz and spiritual themes.

Title: Stan Getz and João Gilberto release Getz/Gilberto
Description: Popularizes bossa nova worldwide with “The Girl from Ipanema.”

Title: Miles Davis records Miles in Tokyo
Description: Captures his live band’s dynamic performance in Japan.

Title: Eric Dolphy records Out to Lunch!
Description: A defining avant-garde jazz album with complex structures.

Title: John Coltrane records Meditations
Description: Reflects his late spiritual and free jazz explorations.

Title: Miles Davis releases Filles de Kilimanjaro
Description: A transitional album toward jazz fusion.

Title: Tony Williams Lifetime forms
Description: Drummer Tony Williams pioneers jazz fusion with this power trio.

Title: Weather Report forms
Description: Wayne Shorter and Joe Zawinul create one of fusion’s seminal bands.
